name: F Framework
short_description: (F)irm, (F)ast, (F)lexible and (F)ree Java Web Framework. Supports RESTful web services in a manner roughly based on JAX-RS and Jersey. Prevents mixing presentation and business layer by powerful template system and flexible, reusable components.
